title: Shopping & Restaurants: Thanking Customers (Usefulness 5-10)
description: Traveler usefulness 5-10/10 phrases for the Thanking Customers subcategory within Shopping & Restaurants. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.english: Thank you very much (for having shopped here.)
cards.japanese: ありがとうございました。

cards.english: Thank you for visiting us today. (at shop)
cards.japanese: 本日はご来店ありがとうございました。
